notes:
Boss of Scrapper level Pit #7.
Drasilla has a feminine name, suggesting that she is female. There are three other known dragon females: [[Grand Mother Foulscale]], [[Gelidrazah the Frozen]], and [[Kalyassa]].
[[Spirit of Earth|Next #8]].
sounds: YOU CAN'T KEEP ME HERE FOREVER
name: Drasilla
strategy: Drasilla is very similar to a regular dragon. Just do like you would do if you were going to solo a [[dragon]], not much strategy needed just keep diagonal. You could use a [[Dragon Necklace]] to reduce fire damage a bit.
